sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"
import { Flex, Box, Heading, Link, ButtonGroup, Button, FormControl, FormLabel, Input, Stack, Switch, useColorMode } from "@chakra-ui/react"
import Title from "./Title"
import Footer from "./Footer"

function HomePage(props) {
    const [email, setEmail] = useState('')
    const [password, setPassword] = useState('')

    const { colorMode, toggleColorMode } = useColorMode();
    const bgColor = { light: "gray.50", dark: "gray.800" };

    return (
        <Box>
            <Box p={1} mb={2} bg="gray.400" textAlign="center">
                <Heading as="h1" noOfLines={1}>
                    Todo List
                </Heading>
                <FormControl>
                    <FormLabel>
                        Light
                    </FormLabel>
                    <Switch isChecked={colorMode === 'dark'} onChange={toggleColorMode} />
                    <FormLabel>
                        Dark
                    </FormLabel>
                </FormControl>
                
            </Box>
            <Flex align="center" justify="center" h="80vh">
                <Box p={5} borderWidth="1px" w="500px" rounded="lg" bg={bgColor[colorMode]}>
                    <Stack spacing={3}>
                        <FormControl>
                            <FormLabel>Email</FormLabel>
                            <Input type='email' value={email} onChange={e => setEmail(e.target.value)} />
                            <FormLabel>Password</FormLabel>
                            <Input type='password' value={password} onChange={e => setPassword(e.target.value)} />
                        </FormControl>
                        <ButtonGroup>
                            <Button>Login</Button>
                            <Button>Sign up</Button>
                        </ButtonGroup>
                    </Stack>       
                </Box>
            </Flex>
            <Footer />
        </Box>
    )
    
}

export default HomePage
